Make a Scatterplot for Benchmarking

Source: R/visualisation.R
makeBenchmarkingScatterplot.Rd

Make a Scatterplot for Benchmarking

makeBenchmarkingScatterplot(result_list, ref_data, file_name = NULL)

Arguments

result_list

named list containing all deconvolution results that should be considered, cell type annotations need to contain the same cell types as the ones in ref_data
ref_data

reference cell types which are used as the ground truth
file_name

(optional) plot is saved in this file

Value

the ggplot object

Examples

data("single_cell_data")
data("cell_type_annotations")
data("batch_ids")
data("bulk")
data("RefData")
names(RefData) <- c("T_cell", "Monocyte", "B_cell", "DC", "NK_cell")
sig_bisque <- build_model(
  single_cell_data, cell_type_annotations, "bisque",
  batch_ids
)

#> Converting single-cell counts to CPM and filtering zero variance genes.
#> Filtered 0 zero variance genes.
res_bisque <- deconvolute(
  bulk, sig_bisque, "bisque", single_cell_data,
  cell_type_annotations, batch_ids
)
res_scdc <- deconvolute(bulk, NULL, "scdc", batch_ids,
  single_cell_object = single_cell_data,
  cell_type_annotations = cell_type_annotations
)

#> Warning: no non-missing arguments to min; returning Inf
#> Warning: no non-missing arguments to min; returning Inf
#> Warning: no non-missing arguments to min; returning Inf
#> Warning: no non-missing arguments to min; returning Inf
#> Warning: no non-missing arguments to min; returning Inf
#> Creating Basis Matrix adjusted for maximal variance weight
#> Used 2303 common genes...
#> Used 9 cell types in deconvolution...
#> HD30_PBMC_0 has common genes 2099 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 17
#> HD30_PBMC_1 has common genes 2126 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 21
#> HD30_PBMC_3 has common genes 2118 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 19
#> HD30_PBMC_7 has common genes 2109 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 15
#> HD31_PBMC_0 has common genes 2143 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 15
#> HD31_PBMC_1 has common genes 2086 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 21
#> HD31_PBMC_3 has common genes 2038 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 14
#> HD31_PBMC_7 has common genes 2104 ...
#> WNNLS Converged at iteration 17
result_list <- list(SCDC = res_scdc, Bisque = res_bisque)
result_list <- lapply(result_list, function(elem) {
  as.matrix.data.frame(data.frame(
    T_cell = rowSums(elem[, grepl("T cell", colnames(elem)), drop = FALSE]),
    DC = rowSums(elem[, grepl("DC", colnames(elem)), drop = FALSE]),
    Monocyte = rowSums(elem[, grepl("Mono", colnames(elem)), drop = FALSE]),
    NK_cell = rowSums(elem[, grepl("NK", colnames(elem)), drop = FALSE]),
    B_cell = rowSums(elem[, grepl("B cell", colnames(elem)), drop = FALSE])
  ))
})
makeBenchmarkingScatterplot(result_list, RefData)

# Alternative if you want to save the plot in a file
# makeBenchmarkingScatterplot(result_list, RefData, "predictionVsGroundtruth.png")
